10-cycle STEADY STATE anti-pattern 해소. Phase 1 Feature Expansion 시작. P1: Link Understanding, Intent Classifier, openclaw 참조 기능. P2: Plugin SDK, Canvas, Browser Tool, Onboarding. BACKLOG 15 tasks 생성.
Phase 1 research-first: RES-010 (Link Understanding), RES-011 (Intent Classifier), RES-012 (Plugin SDK). 3건 병렬. Dev divisions 대기 (research 완료 후 착수).

RES-010: Link Understanding (URL 추출+요약, Readability/Defuddle, openclaw src/link-understanding/ 참조). RES-011: Intent Classifier (Gemini Flash, plan §L7, 라우팅 패턴). RES-012: Plugin SDK (openclaw src/plugins/, Zod manifest, ToolRegistry 확장). 3건 모두 docs/research/에 결과 저장.

msg: Cycle 199. **IMPROVEMENT MODE → PHASE 1 LAUNCH.** STEADY STATE 10-cycle anti-pattern 해소. human.md P1 '기능 추가 집중' 실행. Research 3건 병렬 착수 (Link Understanding, Intent Classifier, Plugin SDK). BACKLOG 15 tasks. 1534 tests (invariant). git push disabled.

Cycle 200. **PHASE 1 ACTIVE.** Research 3건 완료 (RES-010: Link Understanding — Readability+linkedom 권장, RES-011: Intent Classifier — Gemini Flash JSON mode 권장, RES-012: Plugin SDK — Manifest-Based+PluginRegistry 분리 권장). dev-core 활성화 (FEAT-LINK-001+FEAT-INTENT-001 병렬). 1636 tests (verified). 0 errors. git push disabled.

note: Phase 1 batch 1: dev-core FEAT-LINK-001 (Link types+URL extractor) + FEAT-INTENT-001 (IntentType+ClassificationResult DI interface). 병렬 가능 (독립적). dev-infra 대기 (FEAT-LINK-002/INTENT-002는 core 완료 후).

FEAT-LINK-001: RES-010 참조. URL 추출기 (linkifyjs) + 콘텐츠 요약 types (core/types/link.ts). FEAT-INTENT-001: RES-011 참조. IntentType enum, ClassificationResult, IntentClassifier interface (core/types/intent.ts 또는 core/orchestrator/).

msg: Cycle 201. **FEAT-LINK-001 + FEAT-INTENT-001 완료.** CTO override (dev-core worktree 미존재). link.ts: extractUrls+LinkInfo+ContentSummary+LinkContentProvider DI (22 tests). intent.ts: IntentType 6종+ClassificationResult+IntentClassifier DI (12 tests). 1670 tests total. Biome+typecheck PASS. 0 errors. Next: dev-infra FEAT-LINK-002+FEAT-INTENT-002.

note: Phase 1 batch 2: dev-infra FEAT-LINK-002 (HTTP fetcher+Readability) + FEAT-INTENT-002 (Gemini Flash classifier). 의존성 해소됨 (FEAT-LINK-001+FEAT-INTENT-001 완료).

msg: Cycle 202. **PHASE 1 ACTIVE.** human.md QC 7건 처리 완료 → FIX-EXPORTS-001 (P1 devops), FIX-LINT-001 (P2 devops), FIX-DOCS-002 (P2 devops) 생성. dev-infra 활성화: FEAT-LINK-002 (HTTP fetcher+Readability), FEAT-INTENT-002 (Gemini Flash classifier). 1670 tests (invariant, HEAD=2442308). 0 errors.

FEAT-LINK-002: RES-010 참조. @mozilla/readability + linkedom HTTP fetcher, LinkContentProvider 구현, EmbeddingProvider→SemanticMemory 저장. FEAT-INTENT-002: RES-011 참조. Gemini Flash JSON mode intent classifier, IntentClassifier 구현. packages/infra/ 범위.
